item.title: A City of 20000
item.description: A city of 20000 Of 20000 lives Of 20000 dreams Of that many whips And 20000 lashes Of 20000 abbeys And that many monks Of 20000 prayers And that’s many silences Of 20000 songs And 20000 cries Of 20000 bowls And all of them empty.
